column4: Anyone use Pidgin, I can't find how to tell it where to save transfers
Right now it's using an non-existent directory which is kind of a problem
or etc. etc. the list goes on
pidgin asks you before you accept the transfer, no?
if you did auto-accept, then a folder with that user's email is created on the desktop
I'm lost, whois is like when I do /whois nick and it gives me information from NickServ?
Err it does but the directory is non-existent so it just failed instantly without asking me anything
